resources.string: \tThis mobile app is an initiative by ASIET alumni association, to increase the engagement of alumni with college and to device new platform to provide services to alumni members like job, mentorship etc. App roadmap designed to cater professional needs of alumni members. Services will be available as upgrades of this application; hence please upgrade this application as and when you received a notification from Google Play store.

\n\tStudents and alumni members of ASIET do this application development based on inputs from Alumni association; which gives an opportunity for students to work on real-time projects. Penser Labs, a start-up co-founded by alumni members Sibin and Shyam mentoring in-house students as per the requests from alumni association.

Alumni Association :

Anoop Ismail (President president.alumni@adishankara.ac.in )

Regional chapter point of contacts:

We have list of volunteers running our regional chapters whom you can contact. We have WhatsApp groups (soon will be replaced by this application) for all these chapters. Please be in touch with regional POCs or mail to info.alumni@adishankara.ac.in
